snippet: Brian Kelly took the coaching lessons he learned at Grand Valley State with him to Notre Dame, where his undefeated team awaits the Bowl Championship Series national title game.
abstract: Profile of Notre Dame head football coach Brian Kelly, who is preparing team for Bowl Championship Series national title game against Alabama; Kelly won two Division II national title while coaching at Grand Valley State in Allendale, Mich.
lead_paragraph: Brian Kelly took the coaching lessons he learned at Grand Valley State with him to Notre Dame, where his undefeated team awaits the Bowl Championship Series national title game.

headline.seo: For Notre Dame’s Kelly, Grand Valley State Remains Near
headline.main: For Irish’s Kelly, Grand Valley Remains Near
headline.print_headline: Where Irish’s Coach Found His Inspiration
